docs.snippet: For Bruno Pagliai, the Italian-born Mexican industrialist, imagination--on the soaring scale that produced the Renaissance--is the essential ingredient needed to make the proposed Latin American Common Market a reality.
docs.lead_paragraph: For Bruno Pagliai, the Italian-born Mexican industrialist, imagination--on the soaring scale that produced the Renaissance--is the essential ingredient needed to make the proposed Latin American Common Market a reality.
docs.abstract: Industrialist B Pagliai discusses success of joint ventures by Mex and foreign investors, mainly Amers; notes Mex is emerging as developed country but must speed indus expansion to fill job needs

headline.main: Mexican Recipe for Latin Unity; Lots of Imagination and Joint Deals, Pagliai Says

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 7--The Washington Whips, represented by the Aberdeen Dons of Scotland, took a 1-0 lead in the fourth minute of a United Soccer Association game tonight when New York's Julio Dalmao, trying to clear the ball from in front of the goal,...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 7--The Washington Whips, represented by the Aberdeen Dons of Scotland, took a 1-0 lead in the fourth minute of a United Soccer Association game tonight when New York's Julio Dalmao, trying to clear the ball from in front of the goal, clipped it with the side of his foot and it went into the net.

headline.main: SKYLINERS SCORE FOR RIVALS, LOSE; Washington Wins With Gift Goal From New York, 3-0

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 7 (UPI)-- The International Amateur Basketball Federation turned down today a Soviet protest of the United States' 59-58 victory in the world basketball championship last night.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 7 (UPI)-- The International Amateur Basketball Federation turned down today a Soviet protest of the United States' 59-58 victory in the world basketball championship last night.

headline.main: Soviet Five's Protest Denied In U.S. World Meet Victory

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 10 (AP) The United States defeated Poland, 91-61, last night and stayed in contention for the championship in the world basketball tournament when Uruguay upset Yugoslavia, 58-57.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 10 (AP) The United States defeated Poland, 91-61, last night and stayed in contention for the championship in the world basketball tournament when Uruguay upset Yugoslavia, 58-57.

headline.main: U.S. Five Crushes Poland And Ties for Tourney Lead
